title: I study a lot, sometimes constantly 18 hours a day 5 days a week. But still I am an average student, my average score is B- and sometimes C. Why do I never get an A in exams? - Quora

response.answer_text: I was traveling with a third year university student who confided almost the same thing to me. He was very conscientious but low performing. When we got back, he his parents paid to have him evaluated by someone who diagnoses learning disabilities and he had one. It is remediable and he started to notice a complete changeover once he understood that there was a reason for his performance challenges.
